Title Bar

A navigational component which can display the current screen the user is on, along with additional controls or menu items.

Title Bar
Left Link Right Link

Basic HTML

You can create a Title-bar with this basic HTML

Left Right

Center
Left Right

Center Right
Left Site Name Right Link

Center
Left Right

Center Right

Additional Options

You can easily customize Title-bar with these classes:

```html .primary = primary color .dark = dark color .left = float content left .right= float content right .center = center content ```

Sass Variables

You can customize with Title Bar with these variables in _settings.scss:

```scss $titlebar-center-width: 50%; $titlebar-side-width: (100% - $titlebar-center-width) / 2; $titlebar-background: #eee; $titlebar-color: #000; $titlebar-border: 1px solid #ccc; $titlebar-padding: $global-padding; $titlebar-item-classes: ( center: 'center', left: 'left', right: 'right', title: 'title', ); ```
